products.name: VitAir
products.oneLiner: Core wearable air system for daily vitality.
products.long: VitAir is a compact, everyday wearable air device designed to support comfortable breathing in varied environments. It focuses on clean design, quiet operation, and seamless app control.

products.name: VitAir Beauty+
products.oneLiner: Precision airflow for beauty and skincare routines.
products.long: Beauty+ focuses on controlled, hygienic airflow for makeup, skincare, and grooming workflows. Optimized nozzles and profiles keep sessions consistent.

products.name: VitAir OR
products.oneLiner: Controlled air platform for operational rooms (non-medical, TBD).
products.long: OR is oriented for controlled environments where precision airflow and hygiene are important. Specifications and claims are TBD and under development.

products.name: VitAir ReGen Cap
products.oneLiner: Focused airflow cap for recovery and rest (TBD).
products.long: ReGen Cap is a conceptual wearable that delivers gentle, tunable airflow to support rest and recovery scenarios. Details are TBD and under development.
